mapper.select: select * from tblBoard order by boardGroup desc, boardSequence asc
mapper.insert: insert into tblBoard(idx,memID,title,content,writer,boardGroup,boardSequence,boardLevel,boardAvailable) select IFNULL(MAX(idx),1), #{memID},#{title},#{content},#{writer}, IFNULL(MAX(boardGroup)+1, 0),0,0,1 from tblBoard;
